message.content:
I need to identify the cash and cash equivalents at the end of the period from the cash flow statement.

Looking at the cash flow statement, I can see the section titled "Cash and Cash Equivalents" which contains three line items:
- Beginning Balance: 8000000.00
- Ending Balance: 3276562.05
- Net Increase: -4723437.95

The specific line item we need is "Ending Balance" which represents the cash and cash equivalents at the end of the period. The value is 3276562.05.

```json
{"solution": {'value': '3276562.05'} }
```
